ygData.subject: Re: New Member *wave
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey Shernot, it s nice to see someone else from The Rathe server post here. Feel free to look up my wiz if you need a lift anywhere. My toons on the Rathe
ygData.messageBody:
Hey Shernot, it's nice to see someone else from The Rathe server
post here. Feel free to look up my wiz if you need a lift anywhere.

My toons on the Rathe (well some anyway)
Morrog- 27 necro
Fariel-54 wiz
Glorfindol- 28 pally
Vicksen- 64 war
Shalmazar- 53 druid
Taladinos-50 war
Lyzzarddo- 27 monk

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "shernot" <shernot@y...> wrote:
> Hello all, I am Shernot of The Rathe, Lvl 65 Druidess along with a
65
> cleric, 56 paladin, 37 enchanter, 32 beastlord, 32 rogue, 51 bard
and
> 33 warrior. Been an active EQ'r for over 4 years and in Time having
a
> blast. If theres any questions you have or problems or if you just
> need me to pop by in a zone to buff just yell!
